title: CHURCH ORB / figurine
description: this pops up and tells you you should give dolores dei your figurine

dialogueTree.title: Reaction Speed: "Hey! Her Innocence Dolores Dei like..."
dialogueTree.text: Hey! Her Innocence Dolores Dei liked little figurines, right? Liked holding little men between her fingers, remember?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You have the Headless FALN Rider fi..."
links.text: You have the Headless FALN Rider figurine. You should give it to her. Win her back!

links.title: You: "What? (Look around.) Win who back?..."
links.text: What? (Look around.) Win who back? I can't win her back, she's a long dead historical figure.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Don't be so pessimistic. Love doesn..."
links.text: Don't be so pessimistic. Love doesn't die that easily!

links.title: Inland Empire: "This isn't funny... you have a bad..."
links.text: This isn't funny... you have a bad feeling about this one.

links.title: You: "I should yes. This is a TASK of min..."
links.text: I should yes. This is a TASK of mine now.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "So very, very, *very* nifty... nift..."
links.text: So very, very, *very* nifty... nifty and mysterious. This is surely what the figurines are for!

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You have the revolutionary soldier..."
links.text: You have the revolutionary soldier figurine. You should give it to her. Win her back!

links.title: You: "No, I don't remember anything, I do..."
links.text: No, I don't remember anything, I don't want to think about this. Good bye. [Discard thought.]

links.title: Reaction Speed: "No... it would have been *beautiful..."
links.text: No... it would have been *beautiful*. Really tiny. Thoughtful. Clever!

links.title: Volition: "Whatever this was, it feels like yo..."
links.text: Whatever this was, it feels like you made the right choice not to peek into it.
